Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with a back-pillar, darker glazed lappet wig and hieroglyphic text in seven horizontal lines down front, now virtually illegible; uninscribed back-pillar, long beard broken off; arms crossed to hold hoes in shallow relief.
Condition: fair (beard lost, base cracked and repaired)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
